Articles.Content:
Toggle your GUI off and on with F2. Take Screenshots with F1.

This one isn't about hardware. It is best if your GUI is off. Show us the wondrous universe!

Oops.

Ok, someone fire a missile at this thread.

Nobody looks in that other forum, the pics megathread should have stayed in general. Especially since screenshots aren't fanart.

In fact, the only reason to visit that other forum is for the picture thread.

To be honest, by the title I thought that would mostly be about writings, logs and such. Like my own showcase thread somewhat except more about first person stories and like that.

But, whatever. Carry on!

...There's a thread for that.

-This meme courtesy of Rage097 industries.
Seems that quite lot Threads were moved from general discussion. Must be the work of some new moderator.

The "Show off your awesome KSP Pictures" thread has been moved back to General, so I'll lock this one and link to the other one: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24533-Show-off-your-awesome-KSP-pictures!

I understand that all the moving threads around may have been confusing for some.
